cleaned_rules: ['By registering or login here, you must read and agree to our ToS, Privacy Policy and Code of Ethics. You acknowledge that your IP & email addresses can be logged for security purposes. Skip signin / signup if you do not agree.',

'You can provide interesting links and commentary on longer articles / content published elsewhere. If you just send in a little blurb saying “I like xyz.com app and think they are great” it goes to junk.',

'Though if statements are just a kind of multiverse geolocation device being embedded into the connected mob as standalone, drive with care! You can send detailed suggestions, grievances or complaints to editor@wisepoint.org with your full profile, phone and email.']

'Spam is not tolerated on BoLS.',
'No Prohibited Content: It is prohibited to link to pornography or content that can damage computers or data such as viruses or malware.',

'Do not use racist slurs, prejudiced comments, profanity, derogatory statements, or hate speech. Evading the moderation filters by using punctuation marks or purposefully misspelling words is considered an offense.',

'Do not initiate arguments of a personal nature. Be courteous to other users, even if you disagree with someone or believe that they are ill-informed. Refrain from flaming posts or comments. You may argue and debate, but do not make any attacks of a personal nature (including grammar trolling).']

'The server is not open to the general public. But if you are or know one of the Van Gogh-Goghs, you can have an account here. \r\n',
Illegal content of any kind will not be tolerated. Any kind. Any. Kind. Don't make me go research what this means in every jurisdiction in the world. it's easier to just ban you.]

If you are trying to register to join this server, I will consider adding you if we have spoken before and you can point me to an account of yours I've interacted with. Everyone else will be denied sight unseen.,

'Beiträge, für die die noAFD oder noSVP applaudieren würden, sind hier unerwünscht. Also keine faschistischen, rassistischen, sexistischen, queerfeindlichen und sonstigen entmenschlichenden Inhalte.']

'No posts promoting unsupported conspiracy theories, or other false or misleading information.',
'No content illegal in the United States.']

['There is no room here for insults, hatred, misinformation, falsified data, racism, Nazism, homophobia, hostility towards the disabled, faecal language, threats to minors, and the like... this applies to texts as well as pictures and videos.',

'Hier ist kein Platz für Beleidigungen, Hass, Fehlinformationen, gefälschte Daten, Rassismus, Nazismus, Homophobie, Behindertenfeindlichkeit, Fäkalsprache, Bedrohung von Minderjährigen und dergleichen... dies gilt sowohl für Texte als auch für Bilder und Videos.',

Il n'y a pas de place ici pour les insultes, la haine, la désinformation, les données falsifiées, le racisme, le nazisme, l'homophobie, l'hostilité envers les handicapés, le langage ordurier, les menaces envers les mineurs, etc... ceci s'applique aussi bien aux textes qu'aux images et aux vidéos.,

'Aquí no tienen cabida los insultos, el odio, la desinformación, los datos falsificados, el racismo, el nazismo, la homofobia, la hostilidad hacia los discapacitados, el lenguaje fecal, las amenazas a los menores y similares... esto se aplica tanto a los textos como a las imágenes y los vídeos.',

Qui non c'è spazio per insulti, odio, disinformazione, dati falsificati, razzismo, nazismo, omofobia, ostilità verso i disabili, linguaggio fecale, minacce ai minori e simili... Questo vale sia per i testi che per le immagini e i video.,

'Siin ei ole ruumi solvangutele, vihkamisele, valeinformatsioonile, võltsitud andmetele, rassismile, natsismile, homofoobiale, vaenulikkusele puuetega inimeste suhtes, fekaalsele keelele, alaealiste ähvardamisele jms... see kehtib nii tekstide kui ka piltide ja videote kohta.',

'Šeit nav vietas apvainojumiem, naidam, dezinformācijai, viltotiem datiem, rasismam, nacismam, homofobijai, naidīgumam pret invalīdiem, fekālijām, draudiem nepilngadīgajiem un tamlīdzīgi... tas attiecas gan uz tekstiem, gan attēliem un video.',

'Čia nėra vietos įžeidimams, neapykantai, dezinformacijai, suklastotiems duomenims, rasizmui, nacizmui, homofobijai, priešiškumui neįgaliesiems, fekalijoms, grasinimams nepilnamečiams ir panašiai... Tai taikoma tiek tekstams, tiek nuotraukoms ir vaizdo įrašams.',

'Nie ma tu miejsca na obelgi, nienawiść, dezinformację, fałszowanie danych, rasizm, nazizm, homofobię, wrogość wobec osób niepełnosprawnych, język fekalny, groźby wobec nieletnich i tym podobne... dotyczy to zarówno tekstów, jak i zdjęć oraz filmów.',

'Nie ma tu miejsca na obelgi, nienawiść, dezinformację, fałszowanie danych, rasizm, nazizm, homofobię, wrogość wobec osób niepełnosprawnych, język fekalny, groźby wobec nieletnich i tym podobne... dotyczy to zarówno tekstów, jak i zdjęć oraz filmów.',

'Her er der ikke plads til fornærmelser, had, misinformation, forfalskede oplysninger, racisme, nazisme, homofobi, fjendtlighed over for handicappede, fækal sprogbrug, trusler mod mindreårige og lignende... dette gælder både for tekster, billeder og videoer.']
